itemBody.p: Read this postcard from your English pen-friend, Sam.

blockquote.p:
Here is a postcard of my town. Please send me
a postcard from your town. What size is your
town? What is the nicest part of your town?
Where do you go in the evenings?
Sam.

extendedTextInteraction.prompt: Write Sam a postcard. Answer the questions. Write 25-35 words.

itemBody.p: "Ours is a small town. There are nice trees and some old buildings. Does it really matter where I go in the evenings?"
